title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: Contact Public Affairs
body: Contact Public Affairs      Our public affairs office hours are 7:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. Hawaii Standard Time on weekdays, except for federal holidays. For media inquiries, please call Julia Clebsch at (808) 422-3315. For social media or website related questions, please contact Rebecca Schwab at (808) 226-4100 or send an email to valr_social_media@nps.gov.
